content.notice: This is to inform all UG, Dual Degree, and PG students of both NITA and INTA appearing for the Even Semester End Term Examinations, scheduled to commence on 30th April 2024, that the Admit Cards for the said Examinations can be printed from their respective MIS Accounts as per the schedule mentioned below.

exam_details.exam_name: Even Semester End Term Examination of UG, Dual Degree and PG Students

instructions: No student will be able to print their Admit Card before or after the above-mentioned schedule.
All students are hereby instructed to bring their Admit Card to the Examination Hall while appearing for the examination and obtain endorsement from the invigilator at the designated place.

Any student who fails to bring the Admit Card on any day of the examination will be required to download a Duplicate Admit Card from their respective MIS account for the remaining days, against a fine of Rs. 200/-.
Students without their respective Admit Cards will be debarred from appearing in the Examinations.
copy_to: All HoDs for kind information and necessary action, please.
Associate Dean (UG & PG) for kind information.
The System Administrator, NIT Agartala. He/She is requested to upload the Notification on the Institute Website.
